title: Ragavendra Raja
author: Ragavendra Raja
content: 1inch Network is a decentralized network of composable, inherently interrelated financial instruments.Featuring basic and advanced features, the 1inch Network enables anyone to access and explore the world of decentralized finance (DeFi).1INCH, the platform provides its decentralized "instant governance" model, as well as facilitating liquidity mining.1inch Network (1INCH)’s circulating supply is 583M 1INCH while its total supply is 1.5B as per CoinMarketCap. 1inch Network (1INCH) can be traded on top cryptocurrency exchanges including Binance, BTCEX, OKX, Bybit, and MEXC, and others.1inch Network (1INCH) Price Prediction 2022A price swing occurred at $0.5591 to $0.6376 for 1iNCH Network (1INCH) after touching the lowest of the month at $0.5591.The price was bouncing back from the support level and is now moving sideways and is expected to breakout from the sideways soon. Meanwhile, we predict 1INCH’s long-term price will stay bullish since it cannot break through the current support level anytime soon. We can expect 1INCH to reach above $1 in 2022.
